entities.name: Mrs. Cattermole
entities.description: Mrs. Cattermole is a Muggleborn, who claims that the wand chose her when she was eleven years old.

entities.name: Umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is a Ministry official, who is interrogating Mrs. Cattermole and seems to be enjoying it.

entities.name: Yaxley
entities.description: Yaxley is present during the interrogation of Mrs. Cattermole, but does not seem to be paying attention.

entities.name: Hermione
entities.description: Hermione is present in the scene and reacts with a squeak when she sees the locket.

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: Harry is present in the scene and wants to attack Umbridge after hearing her laugh.

relationships.description: Umbridge is interrogating Mrs. Cattermole, as evident from the conversation between them.
Hermione sees the locket and reacts with a squeak.
